Title: Prohibits the use of state funds for non-residents seeking an abortion or related procedures
Summary: Prohibits the use of state funds for non-residents seeking an abortion or any other procedure that results in the intentional termination of a pregnancy at any stage of gestation.
LawCode: Amd ยง8, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the use of state funds for non-residents seeking an abortion or related procedures
